source:
%%sql


SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PA IS NULL
        THEN T7.PersonnelAreaID
        ELSE NULL
    END as PersonnelAreaID, -- surrogate key
    T1.PA AS PersonnelAreaCode, -- source system id
    T1.Personnel_Area AS Description, 
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T1.PA, T1.Personnel_Area)) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PA = T7.PersonnelAreaID AND md5(concat(T1.PA, T1.Personnel_Area)) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.PersonnelAreaID IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PA IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T7 ON T1.PA = T7.PersonnelAreaCode
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.PA = T7.PersonnelAreaID AND md5(concat(T1.PA, T1.Personnel_Area)) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.PersonnelAreaID IS NULL -- new employee
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.PA IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
)
GROUP BY T1.PA, T1.Personnel_Area
;



-- odw_harmonised_db.PersonnelArea_dim 
--     PersonnelAreaID,
--     PersonnelAreaCode,
--     Description,
--     SourceSystemID,
--     StartDate,
--     EndDate,
--     IngestionDate,
--     ValidTo
